DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to characterize the airway responses to desflurane during maintenance of and emergence from anesthesia in children whose airways were supported with laryngeal mask airways (LMAs).
DOC.brief_title: Desflurane in Children With Laryngeal Mask Airway
DOC.criteria: scheduled for elective surgery under general anesthesia with laryngeal mask airway history of reactive airways disease with an acute exacerbation within the past 2 weeks if wheezing or an active upper respiratory infection was present on the day of surgery if there was a history of malignant hyperthermia
